term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - binder in chromatography
term.title: binder

item.text: An additive used to hold the solid stationary phase to the inactive plate or sheet in thin-layer chromatography.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 830 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
